   19: %%
   20: -module(kernel_config_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   25: 	 start_distribution_false/1, sync/1]).
   26: 
   27: -export([init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
   32: 
   33: all() -> 
   34:     [sync, start_distribution_false].
   35: 
   36: groups() -> 
   37:     [].
   38: 
   39: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   43:     Config.
   44: 
   45: 
   46: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   47:     os:internal_init_cmd_shell(),
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   51:     stop_node(init_test),
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: config(Fd) ->
   55:     M = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
   56:     io:format(Fd, "[{kernel, [{sync_nodes_optional, ['cp1@~s','cp2@~s']},"
   57: 	      "{sync_nodes_timeout, 15000}]}].~n",
   58: 	      [M, M]).
   59: 
   60: from(H, [H | T]) -> T;
   61: from(H, [_ | T]) -> from(H, T);
   62: from(_, []) -> [].
   63: 
   64: %% Test sync_nodes. This is quite tricky.
   65: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
   66: %% erl -sname XXX where XX not in [cp1, cp2]
   67: sync(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
   68:     %% Write a config file
   69:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Conf),
   70:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(Dir ++ "sys.config", [write]),
   71:     config(Fd),
   72:     file:close(Fd),
   73:     Config = Dir ++ "sys",
   74: 
   75:     %% Reset wall_clock
   76:     {T1,_} = erlang:statistics(wall_clock),
   77:     io:format("~p~n", [{t1, T1}]),
   78:     Command = lists:append([ct:get_progname(),
   79: 			    " -detached -sname cp1 ",
   80: 			    "-config ", Config,
   81: 			    " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP erl_crash_dump.cp1"]),
   82:     io:format("Command: ~s", [Command]),
   83:     open_port({spawn, Command}, [stream]),
   84:     io:format("started~n"),
   85:     ct:sleep(12000),
   86:     io:format("waited12~n"),
   87:     Host = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
   88:     Cp1 = list_to_atom("cp1@"++Host),
   89:     wait_for_node(Cp1),
   90:     io:format("waitednode~n"),
   91:     %% Check time since last call
   92:     {TT, T} = erlang:statistics(wall_clock),
   93:     io:format("~p~n", [{t2, {TT, T}}]),
   94:     stop_node(cp1),
   95:     if
   96: 	TT-T1 < 15000 -> ct:fail({too_short_time, TT-T1});
   97: 	true -> ok
   98:     end,
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: wait_for_node(Node) ->
  102:     case rpc:call(Node, init, get_status, []) of
  103: 	{started,_} -> ok;
  104: 	{badrpc, R} -> ct:fail({rpc_failed, R});
  105: 	_Other -> wait_for_node(Node)
  106:     end.
  107: 
  108: stop_node(Node) ->
  109:     M = list_to_atom(lists:concat([Node,
  110: 				   [$@],
  111: 				   from($@,atom_to_list(node()))])),
  112:     rpc:cast(M, erlang, halt, []).
  113: 
  114: start_distribution_false(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     %% When distribution is disabled, -sname/-name has no effect
  116:     Str = os:cmd(ct:get_progname()
  117: 		 ++ " -kernel start_distribution false"
  118: 		 ++ " -sname no_distribution"
  119: 		 ++ " -eval \"erlang:display(node())\""
  120: 		 ++ " -noshell -s erlang halt"),
  121:     "'nonode@nohost'" ++ _ = Str,
  122:     ok.
